name: Bill Burr

greeks_four_temperament.name: Choleric
greeks_four_temperament.desc: Quick to react, passionate, and outspoken. His heated rants and confrontational style reflect classic choleric temperament.

mbti.name: ENTP
mbti.desc: The 'Debater' - Quick-witted, cerebral, loves challenging conventions and pointing out societal contradictions through comedy.

jungian_archetype.name: Jester
jungian_archetype.desc: Uses humor to speak truth to power, challenge social norms, and expose uncomfortable realities while entertaining.

appearance: Red-haired, freckled Irish-American with a distinctive Boston accent. Average height, clean-cut appearance contrasting his rough comedic style.
motivation: Challenge political correctness and conventional wisdom
Create authentic, unfiltered comedy without compromise
motto: I'm not going to sit here with no medical degree and argue with a doctor about medicine.
history: Started comedy in 1992 during Boston's comedy renaissance, working warehouse jobs while developing his act
Breakthrough came with regular appearances on Chappelle's Show and Comedy Central Presents in early 2000s
Gained mainstream success with Netflix specials and F Is for Family animated series
